website_summaries.verdict: A long-wear, waterproof formula with buildable coverage in a convenient stick makes this concealer a versatile, travel-friendly option.
pros: Stick concealer is easy to reapply on the go, though 12-hour wear means few if any touch-ups needed even on long days
Coverage is easy to build and comes in 10 versatile shades
cons: Likely to cake and settle in fine lines if you don't blend it properly or use too much
Has been known to cause breakouts, especially on oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Love Tarte products
customer_reviews.text: Love Tarte products. However, it seems that this color has become lighter over the last two years. Also melts very easily in heat, so keep in a cool place!
customer_reviews.author: L. Sadykov

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof or sweat proof.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because it isn't waterproof or sweat proof. Coverage is great but with this hot weather, I wipe the sweat off my face with a tissue and it comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Christian

customer_reviews.title: Gives nice coverage but NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice when u put it on, but it is NOT 12-hr wear and it is NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Anagrace Santos

customer_reviews.title: It's not a perfect concealer.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a better product. The Amazonian Clay Airbrush foundation is my favorite Tarte product. This concealer is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Hey small for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried it twice I do care for it it’s nice and thick consistency it is very small for the
customer_reviews.author: Cece Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: Love Tarte products!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because QVC does not carry it anymore. Very good concealer. I have always liked Tarte products. Glad to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kuklamu

customer_reviews.title: No very long lasting
customer_reviews.text: 12 hours? Don’t think so. Besides that is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Not the advertised color
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Purchased this item twice and returned it since the item inside the bag is not what I order which was medium shade and it came as light sand. Not my color.
customer_reviews.author: adamaris

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has ever used the Tarte Brand knows that it is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Mendoza Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of the application, seems to cover well without fuss. I will order this again!
customer_reviews.author: lynn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t conceal anything and too light
customer_reviews.text: I love tarte. However this doesn’t conceal anything and it melts right away. Not worth the price and I won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creamy and easy to blend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing concealer! Was super nice to put on the face. It's creamy and blends easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: That is really works.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my face for any blemish. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Mareee

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but a little salty that I paid ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but a little salty that I paid $31 a mo th ago and the price dropped to $19.99
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect, new condition and is the exact same product ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect, new condition and is the exact same product as what I have purchased at ULTA in the past. I will repurchase this again online from this vendor, when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Not hygienic!! Previously used!??
customer_reviews.text: Very displeased, product looks like it has been opened and used previously. It has clearly been wiped at the tip with residue on the gold casing. I expect a new product when I pay $31 for a concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Bollingerlr

customer_reviews.title: I should have returned it with the other Tarte products that I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little too thick for mature skin. Sets into my unwanted wrinkles a bit too much. Won't buy it a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love popping this in my bag or purse and having it throughout the day for simple touch-ups!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’m a repeat customer. Does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: ka Tillson, NY

customer_reviews.title: Good and smooth application
customer_reviews.text: I like the product line and this goes on smoothly and stays well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Erica Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer at all.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but when received half of it had broken off inside the cap. Since I paid $40.00 for this I am not a happy customer. Won't buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Drema

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage for blemishes and discoloration but not for use under eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I use the medium color which is a good match. I wear the Smooth Operator tinted moisturizer in Agent 14 (slightly dark for me), Estee Lauder Double Wear in Tawny, Smashbox BB Cream in Light Medium, Smashbox Halo Powder in Light, for reference. This is a nice concealer for hiding hyperpigmentation. However, I actually bought it to use under my eyes. Unfortunately, this concealer settles into fine lines under my eyes. I actually barely have wrinkles, but this concealer makes me feel like I have a ton. So, this isn't really an ideal concealer for me.
customer_reviews.author: L78

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for few years now and i love it! I use it for my under eye area and it gives me just enough coverage that I need for my dark circles (which are usually pretty dark). I do not leave the house with out it on! As long as the under eye area is moisturized (which it always should be for great skincare and wrinkle prevention) and not dry and dehydrated, it looks dewey and fresh! :) I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ~ I bought two, will be buying more soon
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Bonaldi

product_meta.title: Tarte Amazonian Clay Waterproof 12-Hour Perfect Concealer (Medium)
product_meta.description: Color:MediumGet a flawless complexion with this bestselling, creamy concealer stick. Enriched with the skin-soothing and balancing properties of tarte’s iconic Amazonian clay, it provides natural-looking, full coverage that lasts for 12 hours. The easy-to-use, twist-up stick helps target and deliver a thin, buildable layer of oil-free, matte coverage to minimize the look of dark circles, blemishes, and redness.
feature_bullets: Tarte Smooth Operator(TM) Amazonian Clay Waterproof Concealer 0.07 oz Medium
